material.mattext: Click on "Toss" to simulate 40 tosses of a fair coin. How many heads did you get (out of 40)? What is the relative frequency of heads?

In our simulation, we got 24 heads out of 40, for a frequency of 24/40 = 0.60. Note that our answer will probably not be the same as yours, since every time you do this simulation you are likely to get a different answer.
